info.name: Genesis Complete API
info.description: Complete API collection for Genesis NLP Annotation Tool. Includes Authentication, Workspaces, Documents, Coreference Annotations, and Editor APIs.

request.description: Get all workspaces for current user
Add member to workspace (ADMIN, ANNOTATOR, CURATOR)
Upload a text file to workspace. Document is automatically tokenized in background. Response includes processingStatus (PENDING/PROCESSING/COMPLETED/FAILED) and processingError fields.
List all documents in workspace. Each document includes processingStatus and processingError fields for async tokenization tracking.
Get document by ID. Response includes processingStatus (PENDING/PROCESSING/COMPLETED/FAILED) and processingError fields.
Get mentions not assigned to any cluster
Get all mentions in a cluster
Open workspace in editor, creates/retrieves session
Get document with tokens for display
Get document with workspace-level token offset
Check system health and module status
